title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.45 - Removal of structures and other property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.45 - Removal of structures and other property

State Regulations

In case of revocation or abandonment of any permit, or
renewal thereof, the permittee shall forthwith remove from the access area and
the reservoir, all landings, docks, floats, boats and other structures, and all
other property belonging to the permittee or any other person; failing in which
the district, the board or their duly authorized representative may summarily, and without instituting any legal proceedings therefor, enter upon and remove
the same from the reservoir access area and charge former permittee for all
costs incurred therefrom. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
